head.title: Batter Up! The Battle of New York Is at Hand

hedline.hl1: Batter Up! The Battle of New York Is at Hand

abstract.p: David Chamalian letter comments on October 20 primer on 'subway' World Series between New York Yankees and New York Mets

block.p: Re ''From Agbayani to Zimmer: A Primer'' (''Subway Series,'' front page, Oct. 20):
Re ''From Agbayani to Zimmer: A Primer'' (''Subway Series,'' front page, Oct. 20):

Many of us metropolitan area residents are thrilled at the chance to see a Subway Series. Allegiances become emboldened, and the scales of passion for either the Mets or the Yankees are now tipping. For most of us, this opportunity may never come around again in our lifetimes, and we want to soak up as much of it as possible.

But let's remember: this is a game we all love. This is a matchup we've all been anticipating. At the risk of sounding preachy, let's enjoy it, and let's be proud of our teams. Let's cheer them on in good sportsmanship. Let's have a lot of fun. But let's keep it civil, too. Let's allow the players to be the spotlight of this series.
